title: "Sheeva.AI Announces Follow-On Investment from Conscious Venture Partners"
excerpt: "She eva.AI today announced it has closed a follow-on investment from Conscious Venture Partners (CVP) through their Conscious Venture Fund II investment vehicle. The investment will further accelerate the adoption of its connected vehicle technology and Open API platform for the automation of location-based services and in-car payments."
